title: Unfocussing window interrupts connection
description: This issue only occurs on the Windows 10 version of the software. After connecting to the server, if I minimise the window or even just unfocus it by clicking elsewhere, it seems the program pauses and so after around 15 seconds, an error message appears. It reads: 'Your connection to the server has timed out.' A recording of this is available at https://youtu.be/dQw4w9WgXcQ
